profile.bio: Systems Engineer with experience in data analysis and knowledge in software development.

about.title: Profile
about.description: Engineer with knowledge in Java, SQL, and Python, complemented by web technologies. Experienced in data analysis and report creation with BigQuery and Looker to support decision-making. I work with agile methodologies and Git, focusing on process optimization and providing efficient support.

description: Developed views in BigQuery using SQL to structure business logic and generate key information for internal and external clients. Additionally, participated in the migration of dashboards to Looker using LookML, implementing data governance practices that facilitated access to management indicators and metrics. Also collaborated in data modeling and documentation, using Git and best practices oriented towards scalability and maintenance of the data product.

items.name: Sales Analytics for Decision Making with Power BI
items.pdf: /certificates/Certificado Analítica de ventas para la toma de decisiones con PowerBI.pdf

items.title: Animal Trip
items.description: Functional app prototype offering safe travel and veterinary accompaniment for pets on planes or buses.

items.title: Heart & Diabetes ML
items.description: Machine Learning project for extracting open data on diabetes and heart diseases for analysis.

items.title: Blackjack Strategic Analysis
items.description: Data mining project analyzing Blackjack games in casinos, extracting patterns and generating strategies to optimize in-game decisions.
